resources.string:
Hi, my name is Haranath. 

My name is Haranath 

I am currently working as a Software developer at Oracle.I graduated at NIT Calicut with Computer science as mainstream. 
I like to travel and it is my only hobby that makes me proud. Till now i travelled a lot of places and covered 2 states which are Tamilnadu and Maharashtra. 
I developed this app as a part of Kotlin course organized by Google developers. I joined this course after seeing a post in linkedin. 
Through this course, i learnt Kotlin programming language well and developed some simple Android apps.
